nodes.text: Bina's Guide to the Creatures of Batuu

Bina's Guide to the Creatures of Batuu was a guide booklet created by Bina, the Amani proprietor of the Creature Stall in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu. Her workers handed the guides out to younglings under the age of ten years free of charge.

The Creature Stall gift shop in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge opened on May 31, 2019 in Disneyland Park and on August 29 at Disney's Hollywood Studios. The booklet Bina's Guide to the Creatures of Batuu is free to children under 10 years old, and contains in-universe information and scavenger hunt activities within the theme park. Children complete the scavenger hunt by collecting stamps in their booklet from cast members at the hunt's locations, then return to the Creature Stall to receive a paper token. The booklet is copyrighted, but has no further information about its real-world authors or designers.
